author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is an updated version of #27413 modernizing AutoMagneticFieldESProducer as part of #26748 by
- Merging header to source
- Removing ParameterSet member
- Making members const, set them in constructor initializer list
- Using trailing underscore for member variables
- Reducing copying of strings
- Using ESGetToken

The difference wrt. #27413 is that the recently-introduced mayConsume mechanism is used for the ESGetToken.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, limited matrix runs.
title: Modernize AutoMagneticFieldESProducer
